Package scaledmarkets.dabl.exec

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileRepo
    An artifact repository.
    PatternSets.FileOperator  
    Repo
    A container for a set of files, such as a repository project, or a directory.
    RepoProvider  
    SnapshotRepo
    A repo that maintains unified change history for each of a collection of files.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Artifact  
    ArtifactOperator
    Perform an operation (specified by a derived class) on a collection of artifacts which are specified via include/exclude pattern sets.
    DablContext
    The execution context of the Dabl process.
    DefaultExecutor
    Determine which tasks should be executed, based on their 'when' conditions, and execute them.
    DependencyGraph
    Construct a dependency graph, that represents the input/output dependencies among the tasks.
    DockerTaskContainer
    Provides ability to control a container, in which a TaskExecutor is running.
    ExpressionContext
    Runtime context in which a Dabl expression is evaluated.
    ExpressionEvaluator  
    LocalRepo
    A DABL "local repository" is a file storage area (e.g., directory) available on the host system that is running the DABL processor.
    PatternSets
    A collection of file patterns specifying files to include and exclude from a repository project or directory.
    PatternSets.Map
    A map of PatternSets, indexed by repo.
    PretendTaskContainer
    Used by TaskSimulatorFactory for simulating task execution.
    RemoteRepo
    A remote container for a set of files.
    RemoteRepo.Map  
    SyntaxWriter
    Methods for writing DABL AST elements as DABL syntax.
    Task  
    TaskContainer
    Provides ability to control a container, in which a TaskExecutor is running.
    TaskContainerFactory  
    TaskDockerContainerFactory  
    TaskSimulatorFactory
    For creating task containers in simulation mode, whereby containers are not actually created, and tasks are not actually executed.
